entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Grand Falls-Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:57 AM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 1:30 PM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -9.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 41 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -19.8°C
Wind: NW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023
